pre.rewrite_response:
1. Confirm severe choking (silent, unable to cough/speak).  
2. Shout for help; call EMS (or have someone call).  
3. Child (over 1 yr):  
   • 5 firm back blows between shoulder blades.  
   • 5 abdominal thrusts (Heimlich).  
   • Alternate 5 + 5 until object clears or child collapses.  
4. Infant (<1 yr):  
   • Support head; 5 back slaps.  
   • Turn over; 5 chest thrusts (two fingers, lower half of sternum).  
   • Alternate 5 + 5.  
5. If becomes unresponsive: start CPR; check mouth before breaths, remove visible object, continue until help arrives or normal breathing returns.
